org.testng
Class TestNGAntTask2

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.Task
          org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java
              org.testng.TestNGAntTask2
Deprecated. Use TestNGAntTask 

public class TestNGAntTask2
extends org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java

TestNG Ant task. It supports the following:

Attributes:

  • enableAssert (boolean): enable JDK 1.4 assertion (default: true)
  • dumpCommand (boolean): dumps the command line used to start TestNG (default: false)
  • suiteRunnerClass (String): fully qualified class name of another TestNG starter (default: org.testng.TestNG)
  • classfilesetref (Reference to FileSet): fileset of .java or .class to be run (console suite)
  • classpathref (Reference to Path): classpath to be used by TestNG
  • outputdir (String): output directory for generating TestNG reports
  • sourcedir (Path): path-like for .java (used only for JDK 1.4 tests)
  • sourcedirref (Reference to Path): reference to a path for .java (used only for JDK 1.4 tests)

Author:
Alexandru Popescu
